member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetContrast
member.summary: Gets the contrast value of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the contrast value of the raw image. The default value is the "as-shot" setting. The value range for contrast is 0.0 through 1.0. The 0.0 lower limit represents no contrast applied to the image, while the 1.0 upper limit represents the highest amount of contrast that can be applied.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetCurrentParameterSet
member.summary: Gets the current set of parameters.
member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to the current set of parameters.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetExposureCompensation
member.summary: Gets the exposure compensation stop value of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the exposure compensation stop value. The default is the "as-shot" setting.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetGamma
member.summary: Gets the current gamma setting of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the current gamma setting.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetKelvinRangeInfo
member.summary: Gets the information about the current Kelvin range of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the minimum Kelvin temperature.
A pointer that receives the maximum Kelvin temperature.
A pointer that receives the Kelvin step value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetNamedWhitePoint
member.summary: Gets the named white point of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetNoiseReduction
member.summary: Gets the noise reduction value of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the noise reduction value of the raw image. The default value is the "as-shot" setting if it exists or 0.0. The value range for noise reduction is 0.0 through 1.0. The 0.0 lower limit represents no noise reduction applied to the image, while the 1.0 upper limit represents full highest noise reduction amount that can be applied.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetRenderMode
member.summary: Gets the current .
member.param: A pointer that receives the current .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetRotation
member.summary: Gets the current rotation angle.
member.param: A pointer that receives the current rotation angle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetSaturation
member.summary: Gets the saturation value of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the saturation value of the raw image. The default value is the "as-shot" setting. The value range for saturation is 0.0 through 1.0. A value of 0.0 represents an image with a fully de-saturated image, while a value of 1.0 represents the highest amount of saturation that can be applied.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetSharpness
member.summary: Gets the sharpness value of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the sharpness value of the raw image. The default value is the "as-shot" setting. The value range for sharpness is 0.0 through 1.0. The 0.0 lower limit represents no sharpening applied to the image, while the 1.0 upper limit represents the highest amount of sharpness that can be applied.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetTint
member.summary: Gets the tint value of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the tint value of the raw image. The default value is the "as-shot" setting if it exists or 0.0. The value range for sharpness is -1.0 through +1.0. The -1.0 lower limit represents a full green bias to the image, while the 1.0 upper limit represents a full magenta bias.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetToneCurve
member.summary: Gets the tone curve of the raw image.
member.param: The size of the pToneCurve buffer.
A pointer that receives the of the raw image.
A pointer that receives the size needed to obtain the tone curve structure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetWhitePointKelvin
member.summary: Gets the white point Kelvin temperature of the raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the white point Kelvin temperature of the raw image. The default is the "as-shot" setting value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.GetWhitePointRGB
member.summary: Gets the white point RGB values.
member.param: A pointer that receives the red white point value.
A pointer that receives the green white point value.
A pointer that receives the blue white point value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.LoadParameterSet
member.summary: Sets the desired option.
member.param: The desired option.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.QueryRawCapabilitiesInfo
member.summary: Retrieves information about which capabilities are supported for a raw image.
member.param: A pointer that receives that provides the capabilities supported by the raw image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetContrast
member.summary: Sets the contrast value of the raw image.
member.param: The contrast value of the raw image. The default value is the "as-shot" setting. The value range for contrast is 0.0 through 1.0. The 0.0 lower limit represents no contrast applied to the image, while the 1.0 upper limit represents the highest amount of contrast that can be applied.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetDestinationColorContext
member.summary: Sets the destination color context.
member.param: The destination color context.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetExposureCompensation
member.summary: Sets the exposure compensation stop value.
member.param: The exposure compensation value. The value range for exposure compensation is -5.0 through +5.0, which equates to 10 full stops.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetGamma
member.summary: Sets the desired gamma value.
member.param: The desired gamma value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetNamedWhitePoint
member.summary: Sets the named white point of the raw file.
member.param: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetNoiseReduction
member.summary: Sets the noise reduction value of the raw image.
member.param: The noise reduction value of the raw image. The default value is the "as-shot" setting if it exists or 0.0. The value range for noise reduction is 0.0 through 1.0. The 0.0 lower limit represents no noise reduction applied to the image, while the 1.0 upper limit represents highest noise reduction amount that can be applied.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetNotificationCallback
member.summary: Sets the notification callback method.
member.param: Pointer to the notification callback method.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetRenderMode
member.summary: Sets the current .
member.param: The render mode to use.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetRotation
member.summary: Sets the desired rotation angle.
member.param: The desired rotation angle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetSaturation
member.summary: Sets the saturation value of the raw image.
member.param: The saturation value of the raw image. The value range for saturation is 0.0 through 1.0. A value of 0.0 represents an image with a fully de-saturated image, while a value of 1.0 represents the highest amount of saturation that can be applied.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetSharpness
member.summary: Sets the sharpness value of the raw image.
member.param: The sharpness value of the raw image. The default value is the "as-shot" setting. The value range for sharpness is 0.0 through 1.0. The 0.0 lower limit represents no sharpening applied to the image, while the 1.0 upper limit represents the highest amount of sharpness that can be applied.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetTint
member.summary: Sets the tint value of the raw image.
member.param: The tint value of the raw image. The default value is the "as-shot" setting if it exists or 0.0. The value range for sharpness is -1.0 through +1.0. The -1.0 lower limit represents a full green bias to the image, while the 1.0 upper limit represents a full magenta bias.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetToneCurve
member.summary: Sets the tone curve for the raw image.
member.param: The size of the pToneCurve structure.
The desired tone curve.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw.SetWhitePointKelvin
member.summary: Sets the white point Kelvin value.
member.param: The white point Kelvin value. Acceptable Kelvin values are 1,500 through 30,000.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.summary: Sets the white point RGB values.

The green white point value.

member.name: IWICDevelopRaw
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide access to the capabilities of a raw codec format.
